content: this legal text summarizes an agreement between three parties referred to as mr pp mr pe and mr pm regarding the division of three parcels of land in municipality osimo each party is assigned ownership of one parcel with mr pp receiving the first parcel mr pe receiving the second parcel and mr pm receiving the third parcel the agreement also includes provisions for easements and access rights between the parcels the parties declare that they are in a legal community property regime and the expenses related to the agreement will be shared equally among the coowners the agreement is signed by all parties and a notary
